column2: 7-12 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver) $4$5$5$my son has had adhd and weve tried ritalin and focalin xr
column3: he had a reaction to both and it was hard for me to handle. finally my primary had prescribed this for my son and it has been helping him be able to stay in school and not get into trouble. he use to run all the time out my gate and now he can stay without running all the time. i really love it alot. i was nervous all the time but now i have some peace of mind.
